SEARCH
Package RentalSystem

Class RentalSystem

java.lang.Object
RentalSystem.RentalSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RentalSystem extends Object implements Serializable
The RentalSystem class represents a rental system that manages vehicles and customers. It allows adding vehicles to the inventory, renting and returning vehicles, and managing finances.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • RentalSystem

      public RentalSystem(String name)
      Represents a rental system. This class manages the available vehicles, rented vehicles, customers, and finances of the rental system.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the rental system

  • Method Details

    • addVehicle

      public void addVehicle(Vehicle vehicle)

    • getAvailableVehicles

      public List<Vehicle> getAvailableVehicles()

    • getRentedVehicles

      public List<Vehicle> getRentedVehicles()

    • rentVehicle

      public void rentVehicle(Vehicle vehicle)
      Rents a vehicle by removing it from the list of available vehicles and adding it to the list of rented vehicles. Also updates the finances by deducting the rental cost.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - the vehicle to be rented

    • returnVehicle

      public void returnVehicle(Vehicle vehicle)
      Returns a rented vehicle to the rental system. If the vehicle is currently rented, it will be removed from the list of rented vehicles and added to the list of available vehicles.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - the vehicle to be returned

    • displayRentalInfo

      public void displayRentalInfo()
      Displays the information of available and rented vehicles in the rental system.

    • calculateRentalCost

      public double calculateRentalCost(Vehicle vehicle, int rentalDuration)
      Calculates the rental cost for a given vehicle and rental duration. If the rental duration is less than 24 hours, it calls the calculateShortRentalCost method of the vehicle. Otherwise, it calls the calculateRentalCost method of the vehicle.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The vehicle for which the rental cost is calculated.
      rentalDuration - The duration of the rental in hours.
      Returns:
      The total rental cost.

    • accessToWallet

      public double accessToWallet()

    • updateFinances

      public void updateFinances(double amount)

    • accessToFinances

      public String accessToFinances()
      Calculates the total finances of the rental system.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the total finances in the format "Total Finances: €[totalFinances]".

    • addVehicleToInventory

      public void addVehicleToInventory(Vehicle vehicle)
